description: This PHP source file generates a web page for configuring RIP routing parameters. It includes server-side code for initializing data and generating HTML/JavaScript for user interaction, with embedded scripts for dynamic form behavior and AJAX submission.

methods.name: initPopulate
methods.description: Populates the form fields with data from the jsRIPEntry JSON object.

methods.name: initEventHandler
methods.description: Sets the state of authentication key and ID input fields based on the selected authentication type.

methods.name: saveRIP
methods.description: Sends the updated RIP configuration to the server via AJAX after form validation.
